entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this morning. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then flurries or blizzard. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
